column2: "Great work! All patterns have been destroyed. We can no longer detect the entity."
"Anyways, this area... due to the high concentration of Ephimera readings in the area, enemies that appear here become stronger."
"We're beginning to understand that the technology that ARKS possess affects with the concentration of Ephimera discovered here. Let's increase it and see what happens."
"Although surveys show that even there is a low concentration in the area, it still registers a stronger energy signature even under the current conditions. Be safe out there!"
